A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Inconsistent jumpy plot\, absurd magical tricks performed left and right by any bystander. The main protagonist Rey is hollow and boring\, lacking motivation and drives except \"hurr-durr\, destroy siths\". Even friendship between Poe\, Finn and Rey looks forced and untrue. The only interesting thing is Kylo -- Luke story\, but it's thrown away like many other potentially intriguing beginnings from the Force Awakens. The new movie tries to lift off from Skywalker saga but fails to introduce anything except confusion.
